entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in New Zealand
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information about the COVID-19 situation from the government, health authorities and other trusted sources across New Zealand. For more, visit https://covid19.govt.nz/.

text: @carolecadwalla @Rugby1Peter She is the real leader. As a Muslim  from other side of the world, I can not forget here first response for  mosques  attack in Christchurch, and she said it a terror attack. Now she did the same dealing with panadmic of COVID19.  Lucky New Zealand  ppl
